content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI previously executed the command "execute_shell" with the argument "ping -c 3 google.com" but it returned an error saying "ping" was not found. I then executed the command "execute_shell" with the argument "sudo apt-get install -y iputils-ping" to install "ping". Recently, the command "execute_shell" returned a STDOUT message saying that iputils-ping was successfully installed and processed triggers for man-db. There was also a STDERR message related to debconf being unable to initialize a frontend. Nothing new happened.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "ping -c 3 google.com"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb'PING google.com (142.251.37.110) 56(84) bytes of data.\\n64 bytes from prg03s13-in-f14.1e100.net (142.251.37.110): icmp_seq=1 ttl=116 time=8.94 ms\\n64 bytes from prg03s13-in-f14.1e100.net (142.251.37.110): icmp_seq=2 ttl=116 time=10.2 ms\\n64 bytes from prg03s13-in-f14.1e100.net (142.251.37.110): icmp_seq=3 ttl=116 time=10.9 ms\\n\\n--- google.com ping statistics ---\\n3 packets transmitted, 3 received, 0% packet loss, time 2003ms\\nrtt min/avg/max/mdev = 8.941/10.017/10.895/0.809 ms\\n'\nSTDERR:\nb''"}]
"""
